name: Recipe Book
backend_requirements: Recipe model: id, title (required), ingredients (text), instructions (text), prep_time, servings
CRUD endpoints: GET /api/recipes, GET /api/recipes/:id, POST, PUT, DELETE
Search recipes: ?query=text searches title and ingredients
frontend_requirements: Recipe list showing title, prep time, servings
Click recipe to view full details (ingredients and instructions)
Add/edit recipe form with all fields
